tOLlw4SN.title: Study on Inhibition and Mechanism of Guizhi Fuling Wan on Hepatic Fibrosis Rats
tOLlw4SN.abstract: Objective: Guizhi Fuling Wan which inhibited hepatic fibrosis in rats was observed and its possible mechanism of action was explored.Method: According to the random-number table,wistar rats of 60 were divided into control group of 8(group A) and model group of 52.The control group was injected subcutaneously with normal saline by a dose of 3 mL·kg-1,model group was injected subcutaneously with 40% CCl4 to make rat liver fibrosis model by a dose of 3 mL·kg-1 for the consecutive 6 weeks.And according to the random-number table again,model group rats were divided into the model group(group B) and the treatment group which comprised low dose(group C),middle dose(group D) and high dose(group E).Group A and group B were given normal saline by a dose of 9.0 mL·kg-1.Group C,group D and group E were given Guizhi Fuling Wan by the dose of 0.45,0.9,1.8 g·kg-1·d-1respectively,and CCl4 would be maintained subcutaneously during period of 4 weeks.After 4 weeks of treatment,general condition,body weight,liver and spleen weight and their coefficient of rats were compared in each group;rats of pathological changes in each group were determined by naked eye,light microscopy and electron microscopy,rspectively.The protein expression of α-SMA,TGF-β1,CTGF,Co-Ⅰ and Co-Ⅲ was detected by using immunohistochemical stains in each group.The mRNA genetic expression of α-SMA,TGF-β1,CTGF,Co-Ⅰ and Co-Ⅲ was detected by using Real-time quantitative PCR in each group.Result: Immunohistochemical stains and real-time quantitative PCR: In model group,protein and mRNA genetic expression of α-SMA,TGF-β1,CTGF,Co-Ⅰ and Co-Ⅲ was significantly increased in liver tissue(P<0.01,vs control group).All the treatment group could bring down protein and mRNA genetic expression of α-SMA,TGF-β1,CTGF,Co-Ⅰ and Co-Ⅲ in liver tissue of rats.Among the treatment group,group D and group E decreased mRNA genetic expression of α-SMA,Co-Ⅰ and Co-Ⅲ significantly(P<0.05 or P<0.01 vs model group),and Group Elessened protein expression of TGF-β1,CTGF obviously(P<0.05 vs model group).Among the treatment group,group D and group E cut down mRNA genetic expression of α-SMA,TGF-β1,CTGF significantly(P<0.01 vs model group),and group E of all the treatment group reduced evidently genetic mRNA expression of Co-Ⅰ and Co-Ⅲ(P <0.01 vs model group).Conclusion: Guizhi Fuling Wan suspension can effectively inhibit liver α-SMA,TGF-β1,CTGF,Co-Ⅰ and Co-Ⅲ gene and protein expression,have a good anti-liver fibrosis.

prxrXa5e.title: Effect of baicalin on Related cytokine expression of rats with hepatic fibrosis
prxrXa5e.abstract: Objective To discuss the mechanism of baicalin resistance of liver fibrosis. Methods The experiment used the CCL4 composite factors of liver fibrosis model, immunohistochemistry, and ELISA technology, to observe the effects of Baicalin on the expression of injury and related cytokines in liver tissues of rat liver fibrosis model, and the preventive and therapeutic effect of baicalin was analyzed. Results Compared with the model group, The expressions of related cytokine and the damage of hepatic tissue significantly improved in Baicalin prevented group (P < 0.05); There had different degrees of improvement in Baicalin treatment group. Conclusion Baicalin can reduce the degree of liver injury, inhibit the expression of the related factor of TGF-β1, PDGF, TNF-α, and have a good intervention on hepatic fibrosis in rats induced by complex factors.

LFGRayUL.title: Effect of fuzheng huayu capsule on cytokines and inflammation-fibrosis index in serum of patients with chronic hepatitis B
LFGRayUL.abstract: Objective To observe the effects of Fuzheng Huayu capsule on cytokines and inflammation-fibrosis indexes in serum of patients with chronic hepatitis B. Methods one hundred and twelve patients with chronic hepatitis B were randomly assigned into treatment group and control group. All patients received conventional therapies. While 56 patients in treatment group were administered with Fuzheng Huayu capsule .additionally. After being treated for 24 weeks, cytokines in serum of patients were detected by using of a highly sensitive chemiluminescence enzyme immune assay. Liver function of patients was determined by ADVIATM1650 chemistry system. HA、PC-Ⅲ、LN、IV-C of hepatic fibrosis indexes in Serum of patients was examined by radio immunoassay. Results (1)TNF- αand IL-6 of cytokines were reduced notably in Serum of patients in the treatment group(P<0.05); while IL-2 and IL-10 were increased remarkably (P<0.05);especially TNF-αwas lowered and IL-2 was augmented prominently in comparison with control group.(2)ALT、AST、GGT、Tbil of Liver function and HA、PC-Ⅲ、LN、IV-C of liver fibrosis indexes were all decreased significantly in patients of the treatment group compared with the control group (P<0.05). but Alb was statistically higher than before in the treatment group (P<0.05). Conclusion Fuzheng Huayu capsule may not only have an effect on inflammation-fibrosis related cytokines in serum of patients with chronic hepatitis B but also can improve patients' liver function and fibrosis.

9ICVjXDt.title: Effect of Salvianolic acid B combined with Hawthorn flavone on lipid peroxidation in the rat of nonalcohol fatty liver disease
9ICVjXDt.abstract: [Objective]To investigate the effect of Salvianolic acid B combined with Hawthorn flavone on lipid peroxidation in the rat of nonalcohol fatty liver disease(NAFLD).[Methods]The rats were randomly divided into five groups:①control group fed with standard chow,②model group fed with a high-fat diet,③Chinese medicine prophylases group with a high-fat diet plus Salvianolic acid B(200mg/kg)and Hawthorn flavone(40mg/kg)orally once a day,④Chinese medicine treatment group fed with a high-fat diet for 4 weeks and then Salvianolic acid B(200mg/kg)and Hawthorn flavone(40mg/kg)orally once a day,⑤western medicine treatment group fed with a high-fat diet for 4 weeksand then Metformin HCI Tablets(0.5g/kg)orally once a day.Serum and liver tissues were collected for biochemical and histlogic test,including SOD and MDA in the liver tissues.[Results]①Blood glucose,triglyceride and total cholesterol were significantly decreased in Chinese medicine prophylases group and Chinese medicine treatment group compared with model group(P<0.01,or P<0.05);②MDA contents in the rats liver were remarkablly reduced in Chinese medicine prophylases group and Chinese medicine treatment group compared with model group(P<0.01 or P<0.05).Superoxide Dismutase activity in the rats liver was significantly increased in Chinese medicine prophylases group and Chinese medicine treatment group in comparison with model group(P<0.01 or P<0.05);③Compared with the model group,hepatocytes in Chinese medicine prophylases group or Chinese medicine treatment group were mildly enlarged with less lipid droplets and mild lobular inflammation.[Conclusion]Salvianolic acid B combined with Hawthorn flavone is effective in improving the lipid peroxidation in the liver of NAFLD rat.

QZo5JAUh.title: Design and realization of the electric cooker’s automatic power-off protection system based on ADuc812 MCU
QZo5JAUh.abstract: Aiming the characteristics that it is not suitable to measure water temperature using a touching method during water heating on an electric cooker,a new indirect method was designed to detect the infrared radiation radiated from the hot kettle and the radiation value is converted into voltage’s changes. It can be judged that the water is boiled or not though the voltage’s signal A/D conversion and its result is analyzed on the ADuc812 MCU. If water boiled ,the power will be off automatically and the function of the electric cooker’s automatic power-off protection will be fulfilled.

cf5bwXwR.title: Design and realization of model elevator and its control systembased on GE Fanuc 90-30 PLC
cf5bwXwR.abstract: Elevator is a typical random logic control object and is very suitable for teaching PLC.In this paper,we selected GE Fanuc Series 90-30 PLC and designed the mechanical structure of a four-layer model of the elevator.We also completed its peripheral hardware circuit design and operational control procedures design,it turns out that work of the elevator solid model using PLC control is stable and reliable, and it also provides good conditions for related design both hardware and software based on this platform.

FHJMTgea.abstract: A method by applicating the proteus and Keil uVision 3 together to construct a microcontroller virtual laboratory is proposed in this paper to solve some problems caused by poor experimental means and high costs in teaching and experiment on microcontroller.The method's implementation process is illustrated through an example on AT89C52 diqital clock and the clock's circuit schematic and all program flow charts are provided here too.

0sC0M7Iy.title: Motion Control System Based on GE Fanuc PLC and DSM324i
0sC0M7Iy.abstract: The motion control system is widely used in machine system and it can use different control system according to different type.By careful studying and learning knowledge about how to use GE Fanuc motion control system,4 shafts motion control system which is based on GE Fanuc PLC and DSM324i module is constructed according to actual study,the hardware principles motion system is detailedly explained,and 2 shafts beeline difference configuration software which is used in this motion system by adopting Proficy Machine Edition 6.0 and it's configuration picture by adopting MCGS imbed version are provided here too.The actual results prove that the system is steady and reliable.

deI1a831.title: Research on the Bearing and Seal Improvement Design in a Vertical Hydraulic Turbine Main Shaft and Its Application
deI1a831.abstract: To overcome the shortcomings of guide bearing and seal installed in a hydraulic turbine main shaft in foul water on plateau area,a new improvement design is put forward in this paper almost without modifying the structure of the original hydraulic turbine on a new three-leaf style guide bearing and a new shaft's seal after researching the work principle of hydraulic turbine main shaft's guide bearing and seal.The new design is used in a real hydropower station's improvement project and a satisfactory result is got.in its practical application.

xKRcyHKo.title: Design and Realization of LCD Clock Based on DSP
xKRcyHKo.abstract: By studying and analyzing the knowledge about how to use TMS320LF2407A DSP chip and LCM12864ZK LCD module, a LCD clock system which was the smallest system board based on TMS320LF2407A DSP chip was constructed. The system can display time on the LCM12864ZK LCD module and adjust time using button. The LCD clock system included two parts, hardware circuits and system program design. The hardware principles of the LCD clock system and main program flow charts were explained. The timer's initialization procedures and the initialization procedure of the LCM12864ZK LCD module which was in accordance with the instructions of the LCM12864ZK LCD module's interface provided read and write timing under the conditions of the TMS320LF2407A DSP chip were provided.

OPVK4dvx.abstract: A cymometer design based on an AT89S52MCU is introduced in this paper and the cymometer circuit working principle is stated too.Some main flow charts on the prognam design and programming essentials still are given out.The result of a real circuit experiment shows that the cymometer has some advantages,low price,high accuracy and work stable and reliable.

xROLq1GN.title: The control system of the aluminum cylindrical ingot sawing machine based on S7-300 PLC
xROLq1GN.abstract: The aluminum cylindrical ingot sawing machine is one of the important and key equipments in an aluminum plant and in the past,most of the machines were imported form western countries.In order to meet the requirement of industries,it is necessary to develop a new type indigenous sawing machine system.This machine adopted the streamline work model,that is to say,the loading devices can stack a batch of the aluminum cylindrical ingots which will be processed and then one aluminum cylindrical ingot will be sent to the length determining and clamping mechanism by a roller transmission system,the sawing machine can saw the ends of the aluminum cylindrical ingot automatically,then the processed aluminum cylindrical ingot can be sent to the unloading devices by another roller transmission system,and at last,a bundling mechanism will package some ingots and one working cycle finished.The SIEMENS S7-300 PLC is used as the control core because the machine’s technical flow is considerable complicated.The principle,composition and technical flow on the new sawing machine system were introduced and analyzed in this paper and the structure drawing and program flow chart for the sawing machine control system on the S7-300 PLC were provided here too.The real situation after the system running shows that the sawing machine system is with the high reliability and automation.

Sbfnoi2r.title: Apllication of quantitative tissue velocity imaging in the function evaluation of left ventricular in patients with hypentision
Sbfnoi2r.abstract: Objective To investigate the value of quantitative tissue velocity imaging(QTVI).in the function evaluation of left ventricular in patients with hypentision.Method 45 healthy people(control group)and 60 patients with hypertension(experimental group)were selected,the tissue motion velocity numbers(Vs,Ve,Va,Ve /Va) of three sections in different walls' segments of left ventricular were detected by QTVI.Results Compared with the control group,the experimental group show lower Vs,Ve of all walls(P<0.05) and lower Ve/Va ratio(P<0.05),except posterior wall and inferior wall(P>0.05).Conclusion QTVI can detect the impairment of cardiac muscle sensitively,accurately and no-invasively,which helpful to the analyse of EH.

7U9z8Ezq.title: Diagnosis of echocardiography in pulmonary atresia with veniricular septal defect
7U9z8Ezq.abstract: Objective:To improve the echocardiographic diagnostic accuracy of pulmonary atresia with veniricular septal defect (PA/VSD). Methods:The data of two-dimensional and Doppler echocardiographic in 21 patients with PA/VSD confirmed were analyzed retrospectively.Results:Native pulmonary arteries(NPA)were seen arteriosus in 14 cases; Pulmonary blood flow wag provided by both NPA and major aortopulmonary collateral arteries(MAPCA) in 5 cases; with only MAPCA and without NPA in 2 cases. The associated anomalies of PA/VSD included atrial isomerism,the atrioventricular connection discordance,the ventriculo-arterial connection discordance,multi-ventricular septal defect,right aortic arch,atrial septal defect,total atrioventricular septal defect,left superior vena cava,partial anomalous pulmonary venous connection. Conclusions:The source of pulmonary blood-flow,the development of pulmonary artery and extremely heterogeneous cardiopulmonary malformation in PA/VSD,echocardiographic can provide accurate diagnosis and classification of PA/VSD and associated intracarcdiac malformations.

EbZ7BuJ5.title: Aggregate analysis by comparing the application of CDFI in diagnosis common non-cyanotic CHD with operation results
EbZ7BuJ5.abstract: Objective:To explore the application value of CDFI in diagnosis common non-cyanotic CHD.Methods:135 common non-cyanotic CHD with complete data were examined,composed of 60 VSD、25 ASD and 50 PDA cases,common examine with CDFI,emphasis on coloboma or port in atrium、ventricle and artery lever,identify the location、size、shape、number,compare the ultrasound result with operations.Results:the ultrasound align coincidence rate is 90.37%,discrepancy rate is 9.63%,it is higher in PDA group,of 14.0%.Conclusions:CDFI can overall diagnose common non-cyanotic CHD in qualitation、align typing and size quantity.And can provide reliable treatment evidence for clinical,it is the best examination method without wound in diagnosis common non-cyanotic CHD.

9lbHAhY7.title: Investigation of microwave in cold circulation condition on treatment of superficial hepatoma guided by CDFI
9lbHAhY7.abstract: Objective: To improve the knowledge of microwave in cold circulation condition on treatment of superficial hepatoma guided by CDFI.Method:review and analysis 5 superficial hepatoma cases treated by this method.Result: follow-up all cases,there were no blood signal and enhancement in the focus of infection with four of all cases,examined by CDFI and contrast-enhanced CT,there is a bit blood signal and enhancement in the focus of infection with the other case a month later,then treated the second time,there were no blood signal and enhancement in the focus of infection.The patients are all alive and well,life span is 8 months to 20 months,follow-up all cases continuously. Conclusion:by this method,we can put the microwave antenna stick in the region with abundance artery blood straightly,and it can block and destroy their blood supply.By cold circulation technique,it retrieve the shortage of higher temperature caused by microwave antenna stick.

SpfbxvBw.title: Tei Index Evaluation on Left Ventricle Function in Essential Hypertension
SpfbxvBw.abstract: Objective: To investigate the clinical value of Tei index in the evaluation of the systolic and diastolic function of the left ventricle in patients with essential hypertension.Methods:50 patients with essential hypertension and 40 patients normal control subjects were examined by echocardiography.Tei index of the left ventricle were measured in all the subjects.Results: Compared with healthy subjects,the patients with essential hypertention show higher LV Tei index.Conclusion: Tei index is a simple and reliable Doppler index of quantitative assessing overall left ventricle function in the essential hypertension group.

hS3nBLm5.title: Assessment of Abnormal Wall Motion in Patients with Myocardial Infarction Using Curved Anatomical M-Mode on Tissue Doppler Imaging
hS3nBLm5.abstract: Objective To evaluate the value of curved anatomical M-mode(CAMM) of tissue Doppler imaging for assessing regional abnormal wall motion in patients with myocardial infarction(MI).Methods Colors of colored motion band and phases of the cardiac cycle obtained by CAMM on TDI in patients with MI were analyzed. Results Colored motion band of wall motion in myocardial infarction displayed following images:1)Red band in systolic and blue band in diastolic was fading and phases were confused;;2)The color band was converted between systolic and diastolic;3)Minute stripes were mixed in the color band.Conclusions CAMM provide a new accurately convenient modelity to assess regional wall motion in patients with MI.

gFx4Wvr5.title: Assessment of left ventricular diastolic function by tissue doppler imaging in patients with dermatomyositis
gFx4Wvr5.abstract: 【Objective】To evaluate the application value of tissue Doppler imaging (TDI) being used to evaluate left ventricle (LV) diastolic function in patients with dermatomyositis(DM) by detecting the 6 segments velocity of mitralis annulus motion. 【Methods】27 patients with DM and 21 normal controls were studied with TDI, the 6 segments velocity in relaxing period of mitralis annulus motion were detected, and detected with the pulse wave dopple (PW), the related datas were compared with those of the control group.【Results】Compared with the normal control, for patients with DM, in PW datas, the early-diastolic peak velocity(E) was increased, late-diastolic peak velocity(A) was decreased and ratio of E and A (E/A) was increased (P <0.05). but in TDI datas,early-diastolic peak velocity (Ea) and ratio of Ea and Aa (Ea/Aa) of the 6 segments velocity in relaxing period of mitralis annulus motion was decreased obviously in patients with DM. Even if E/A was increased or not. 【Conclusions】TDI can be used to evaluate the LV diastolic function in patients with DM by detecting the segments velocity in relaxing period of mitralis annulus motion without wound.

AO8gd96y.title: Assessment of Heart Function with Dilated Cardiomyopathy Using Quantitative Tissue Velocity Imaging and Tei Index
AO8gd96y.abstract: Objective:This study was designed to assess the heart function in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy using quantitative tissue velocity imaging and Tei index.Methods:Thirty-three DCM patients and forty normal subjects were studied by QTVI to obtain LV regional velocity and displacement profiles along LV long-axis view,and peak velocities of LV regional myocardium during systole(Vs),and peak systolic displacements(Ds) were measured;Doppler time interval of LV and RV were measured by Doppler echocardiogram to obtain Tei index of LV and RV in all the subjects.Results:Vs and Ds of LV segments in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy were significantly lower than those in healthy subjects;Tei index of LV and RV in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy were significantly higher than those in healthy subjects.Conclusions: QTVI and Tei index can evaluate systolic and diastolic function in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy,which were simple,directly perceived,reliable and noninvasive.

HoLv8Bo8.title: Assessment of Abnormal Wall Motion in Ventricular Aneurysm by Curved Anatomical M-mode of Tissue Dopple Imaging
HoLv8Bo8.abstract: Objective To evaluate the value of curved anatomical M-mode of tissue Doppler imaging for assessing regional abnormal wall motion.Methods Color of colored motion band and phases of the cardiac cycle obtained by CAMM of TDI in ventricular aneurysm were analyzed.Results Colored motion band of wall motion in ventricular aneurysm displayed following images:1)Red band of rapid ejection was delayed or vanished;2)Blue band of rapid filling was delayed or vanished;3) Color of band was converted;4)Color of band was fading or confused;5)Minute stripe was mixed in color band.Conclusions CAMM provide a new accurately convenient method to assess regional wall motion.

UQkJATti.title: The Diagnosis of CDFI in double outlet of the right ventricle
UQkJATti.abstract: Objective:To evaluate the value of color Doppler flow imaging(CDFI) in diagnosing double outlet of the right Ventricle(DORV) and detecting additional complicated intracardiac abnormalities.Methods:Collecting 25 cases of DORV with two-dimensional multi-slice color Doppler echocardiography,according to Van Praaph's method in DORV of the heart structure of diagnosis,analysis of the performance of ultrasound images.Results:6 cases with juxtaposition of two arraies,13 cases of normal position,and 6 cases of edxtro-malposition.CDFI detected the coexistence of heart malformation,such as VSD,Multiple VSD,Right ventricular outflow tract obstruction,PDA,ASD,CAVC,MA,TGA,pulmonary atresia,Bicuspid pulmonary valve type,PVS,Atrial septal aneurysm expansion and defect,right atrial isomerism,LSVC,mirror dextrocardia,AA,IAA(B),left innominate vein low,collateral vessel formation,left ventricular hypoplasia.Conclusion:Multi-slice two-dimensional echocardiography and CDFI technology combined with non-invasive diagnosis of double outlet right ventricle and the complicated heart malformation is of great value.It can be the first choice of screening method.

ysjyjw5h.title: Quantitative Assessment of Left Ventricular Diastolic Function in Hypertension by Mitral Annulus Velocity
ysjyjw5h.abstract: Objective:To analyse mitral annulus velocity measured by quatitative tissue velocity imaging(QTVI) and to evaluate left ventricular function of hypertension. Methods:30 patients with hypertension were compared with 30 healthy subjects, examing Tissue Motion Velocity numbers(Vs,Ve,Va,Ve/Va) in different wall of left ventricular,than contrast and study the results.Results:Compared with healthy subjects, the patients with hypertention show lower Vs,Ve, Ve/Va ratio of all walls(P<0.05),and the Va was not significantly different between the two groups.(P>0.05).Conclusion:The mitral annular velocity determined by QTVI can arrurately evaluate the left ventricular diastolic function in hypertension patients.

AOIjvSdk.title: Applied Clinical Value of Color Doppler in Prediction of Intrauterine Hypoxia by Detecting the Fetal Cerebral Artery Hemodynamics
AOIjvSdk.abstract: Objective: To evaluate the clinical value of CDFI in diagnosing intrauterine hypoxia by monitoring blood flow in umbilical arteries and cerebral arteries.Methods: Color Dopper blood flow was used to monitor antepartum MCA and UmA blood flow and measure VS,VD,S/D value,PI and RI.Results: S/D value of UmA and MCA decreased when pregnant time increased in normal pregnancy.S/D value of UmA and its RI value in abnormal pregnancy was obviously higer than those of the control normal group,while S/D value of MCA and its RI value in abnormal pregnancy obviously lower.When S/D<4.0,PI<1.6 and RI<0.6,intrauterine hypoxia was indicated,showing that under the circumstance of abnormal pregnancy,RI would decrease first to ensure the blood supply to cerebra.Conclusion: Combined measuring of S/D value,PI and RI can help diagnose intrauterine hypoxia.

cMw25p8I.abstract: Objective:To explore multi-slice spiral CT value in diagnosing carotid body tumor.Methods: Colleted 3 cases of carotid body tumor with imaging and clinical data,which proved by pathology after surgery,combining with literature to analyse its imaging character.Results: 3 cases carotid body tumor all located carotid bifurcation,pushing internal carotid and external carotid move,highly enhancing.Conclusion: We Could make qualitation diagnosis according to its location and enhancement character.

f7JfsZ0P.title: Applied clinical value of color doppler in prediction of intrauterine hypoxia by detecting blood flow
f7JfsZ0P.abstract: Objective To evaluate the clinical value of CDFI in diagnosing intrauterine hypoxia by monitoring blood flow in umbilical arteries and cerebral arteries.Methods Color Dopper blood flow was used to monitor antepartum MCA and UmA blood flow and measure VS,VD,S/D value,PI and RI.Results S/D value of UmA and MCA decreased when pregnant time increased in normal pregnancy.S/D value of UmA and its RI value in abnormal pregnancy was obviously higer than those of the control normal group,while S/D value of MCA and its RI value in abnormal pregnancy obviously lower.When S/D<4.0,PI<1.6 and RI<0.6,intrauterine hypoxia was indicated,showing that under the circumstance of abnormal pregnancy,RI would decrease first to ensure the blood supply to cerebra.Conclusion Combined measuring of S/D value,PI and RI can help diagnose intrauterine hypoxia.

SYoI2tMH.title: Preliminary Study of Left Ventricle Function and Systolic Synchronicity by Full Volume Three Dimentional Echocardiography in Patients with Hypertension
SYoI2tMH.abstract: Objective: To assess left ventricle function and systolic synchronicity in hypertensive patients by full volume three dimentional echocardiography.Methods: Sixty patients with hypertension and thirty normal subjects were acquired images by full volume three dimensional echocardiography,then volume-time curves were obtained by Qlab software.The end diastolic volume(EDV),end systolic volume(ESV),left ventricular ejection fraction(LVEF),left ventricular peak ejection rate(PER),left ventricular peak filling rate(PFR),the timeof minimal systolic volume of 16 segmental standard deviation(Tmsv16-SD),difference(Tmsv16-Dif) were derived,and compare the difference between hypertension group and normal control group.Results: Compared with normal control group,left ventricular peak filling rate of hypertension group decreased significantly(P < 0.05).Volume-time curves fluctuation of hypertension group was bigger,the time difference of ventricular wall to end systolic volume,end diastolic volume was bigger.The differences of Tmsv16-SD(% R-R),Tmsv16-Dif(% R-R) in patients with hypertension were statistically significant in measured values from healthy people(P < 0.05).Conclusions: Full volume three dimentional echocardiography can evaluate left ventricular diastolic dysfunction and systolic synchronicity in patients with hypertension.

Ic7eqTyk.title: Value of quantitative tissue velocity imaging in detecting right ventricular function of chronic cardiopulmonary disease
Ic7eqTyk.abstract: 【Objective】 To evaluate the clinical value of quantitative tissue velocity imaging(QTVI)in detecting right ventricular function of chronic cardiopulmonary disease.【Methods】 52 patients with chronic cardiopulmonary disease and 60 normal controls were studied with QTVI.QTVI indices of intermedius in right ventricle lateral wall and post-interventricular septum,tricuspid valve annulus were detected,and then compared with those of the control group.The indices included systolic peak velocity(VS),early-diastolic peak velocity(VE),late-diastolic peak velocity(VA),ratio of VE and VA(VE/VA).【Results】 Compared with normal controls,VS,VE and VE/VA were decreased significantly in tricuspid valve annulus of chronic cardiopulmonary disease(P <0.05).VA increased slightly in intermedius of right ventricle wall but decreased in tricuspid valve annulus.VS,VE and VE/VA were not significantly different in right ventricle lateral wall and post-interventricular septum of chronic cardiopulmonary disease(P >0.05).【Conclusions】 It has important clinical value,for QTVI in quantitating tricuspid valve annulus motion can exactly,directly assess the right ventricular function of chronic cardiopulmonary disease.

3KTEzPbu.title: Liver Regeneration After Percutaneous Ethanol Injection into Liver Under Ultrasonographic Guidance
3KTEzPbu.abstract: Objective To study the liver regeneration and its dynamic changes after percutaneous ethanol injection(PEI)into the liver under ultrasonographic guidance.Methods Forty SD rats were performed PEI into the liver under ultrasonographic guidance.The liver function,mitosis index(MI),proliferation cell nuclei antigen(PCNA),contents of DNA in cell nuclei and S-phase cell ratio(SPR) of the normal liver tissue were determined prior to the surgery and 1,3,5 and 7 d after surgery.Results Day 1 and 3 after the PEI,the liver tissue MI,PCNA,the contents of DNA in the cell nuclei,and S-phase cell ratio(SPR) were higher than those of the normal (P<0.05).At the day 3 after PEI,the liver regeneration was at the top;at day 5,the regeneration was decreased.The liver function was increased most at the first day after PEI.Conclusions The high concentrated ethanol induced by PEI locally diffused to cause the liver cells necrosed,and to enhance the regeneration of the peripheral liver cells.

J9ll75Eb.title: Established The Model of Percutaneous Ethanol Injection Into Liver On Mouse Under Ultraaonographic Guidance And Study It Dynamically
J9ll75Eb.abstract: Objective:To develop a mouse model of injecting ethanol into the liver under ultrasonographic guidance and study its liver function dynamically.Methods:Forty SD rats were performed percutaneous ethnol injection into the liver under ultrasonographic guidance.The AST and ALT were determinded prior to the surgery and 1,3,5 and 7 d after surgery.At the same time the morphological changes in the liver also observed.Results:AST and ALT were increased most at the first day after PEI then decreased,until the 7th day,it became to normal.HE stained and observed by eye,we can see part of the liver necrosis.Conclusions: Injecting ethanol into the mouse's liver under ultrasonographic guidance could induce high concentrated ethanol locally which cause the liver cells necrosed,This model might be valuable of researching the PEI treating liver disease.

9fEifMHF.title: Study on Cardiac Function of Patients with Tetralogy of Fallot Using Doppler Tei index
9fEifMHF.abstract: Objective:To analyze and evaluate the cardiac function of patients with tetralogy of Fallot(TOF) using the doppler Tei index.Methods: Two groups were selected,30 patients with TOF and 30 healthy control subjects.LV-Tei index、RV-Tei index and LV-EF were calculated,analyzed and compared.Results: LV and RV Tei index of the TOF group are higher than that of the healthy control subjects',the difference was statistically significant(P<0.05),but of the two groups,the LV-EF showed no significant difference(P>0.05).Conclusions: Doppler Tei index could be used to evaluate the whole cardiac function of the patients with TOF.

bbmh86VP.title: The Role of High Intensity Focused Ultrasound in Presacral Neurectomy for the Treatment of Chronic Pelvic Pain
bbmh86VP.abstract: Objective To evaluate the analgesia therapy of presacral neurectomy by high intensity focused ultrasound(HIFU) on patient of CPP.Methods 15 patients with CPP were exposed to the heat radiaton which was focused at the superior hypogastric plexus using HIFU guided by B-US.The changes of VAS and plasma SP before treatment,3 days,1 month,2 months after treatment were measured respectively.Results The pain was mostly relieved.VAS and plasma SP significantly deceased after treatment.No severe complications occurred.Conclusion HIFU treatment is non-invasive and without obvious complications,which is a safe and effective treatment for CPP.

o3Zm6xwE.title: Effect of frozen storage on physicochemical properties and microstructure of eggs
o3Zm6xwE.abstract: Effect of different frozen storage time at -20°C on whole egg, albumen, yolk, boiled egg and boiled yolk of fresh egg were investigated through determination of pH, viscosity, rebound height and structural change in the paper. The results showed that, at -20°C, the rebound height of boiled egg was decreased with increase of storage time of fresh eggs, while the bounce height of boiled yolk was increased 2~4 times after fozen-storaged from 5 to 36 h. Both pH and viscosity of egg yolk, albumin and whole egg had obviously changed with the increase of storage time, and the changes were more significant after freezing the samples for 10 h. The structures of the albumen and yolk frozen for 10 h began to change. After 24 h, yolk became smooth and tight, with gel, formed. And the change was irreversible after 36 h. Therefore, the quality of eggs can be greatly reduced to be substandard by frozen storage at -20°C for 10 h.

y42gwL0Q.title: Growth and malolactic fermentation characteristics of Lactobacillus Plantarum in plum juice
y42gwL0Q.abstract: Plum juice was used as material and Lactobacillus Plantarum LP-L134-1-P was used as inoculation strain for malolactic fermentation (MLF) to reduce acids in juice. The effects of the inoculation amount, pH, fermentation temperature, sugar content, and sodium citrates buffer system on deacidification and the growth of Lactobacillus Plantarum LP-L134-1-P in plum juice were studied. The results showed that the total acids increased at the first stage and then decreased during the fermentation. The MLF proceeded normally at pH 3.50 with the inoculation amount of 108 CFU/g. And the bigger inoculation amount was, the more acids were reduced through MLF. When the inoculation amount was increased to 109 CFU/g and pH was 3.50, the MLF could be performed only if the fermentation temperature was more than 25°C. It would be easy to perform MLF when the inoculation amount was 109 CFU/g and pH was no less than 3.10. The acidity of plum juice went up with addition of 1.00% glucose, indicating that glucose was prior to convert into lactic acid, thus inhibiting the MLF. In sodium citrates buffer system, the acidity was not reduced, proving that Lactobacillus Plantarum LP-L134-1-P could not use citric acid as carbon resource to run MLF.

0EGcM5qb.title: Progress in CMC/Metal (Metal Oxide) Nanocomposites
0EGcM5qb.abstract: Nanocomposite materials of polymers display excellent properties,such as light,electricity,thermal and mechanical properties,and attracted much more attention in these years.Carboxy methylated cellulose(CMC) is an important,natural and biodegradable linear polysaccharide,can be used as the green reaction medium for the preparation of CMC/metal(metal oxide).Furthermore,it becomes the hot topic in the study of environmental-benign nanocomposites.The preparation conditions,reaction mechanism,crystal and morphological structure and particular properties were reviewed in detail in this paper.In addition,the issues in the CMC/metal(metal oxide) and forecast to the future developments of this research field were also discussed.

vFc84ZkL.title: Fluorescence probe based carboxymethyl cellulose/Tb(III) nanocomposites for detection of Mn 2+ with simpleness, rapidness and high sensitivity.
vFc84ZkL.abstract: A novel, rapid, high selective and sensitive probe, carboxymethyl cellulose (CMC)/Tb(III) with green fluorescence, for detecting Mn in aqueous solution during pH = 4-10 was proposed in this work. The probe's synthesis had benefits of mild reaction condition, organic solvent-free and facile operation. A linear relationship between the fluorescence intensity of CMC/Tb(III) probe at 544 nm with 0.046 μM detection limitation and the concentration of Mn in the range of 0.1-100 μM was obtained. The probe was also used to detected Mn in tap water and the recoveries were between 97.10% and 101.61%, and the relative standard deviations (RSD, n = 5) of all samples were less than 2.04%. The results by UV absorption spectrum and fluorescence quenching suggested that there might be a dynamic quenching occurred to the fluorescence of CMC/Tb(III) probe when Mn was involved.

zFNouSwe.title: Structures and high fluorescence of novel nanocomposites of sodium carboxymethyl cellulose/Tb(III) prepared at different pHs
zFNouSwe.abstract: Lanthanide metal complexes as novel luminescent metal-organic frameworks with potential application such as probes, sensors and labels, have greatly been developed. This paper presents novel nanocomposites by reacting terbium salt with the sodium carboxymethyl cellulose (NaCMC) at different pHs, Which were characterized by SEM, TEM, FTIR, XPS, WAXD, GPC, UV-Vis, and PL. The results show that Tb3+ ions react with O of COO-, -OH, and -COC on NaCMC. The morphologies of these nanocomposites showed spheroidal-like with the size around 100 nm at around neutral pH, but show rod-like and band-like around 100 nm in width and about 500 nm in length at pH = 11 and 12. They emit bright green characteristic fluorescence of Tb3+ under ultraviolet light due to the antenna effect when NaCMC transfer the energy efficiently to the Tb ions around neutral pHs. However, at higher pH, they show weaker fluorescence intensity in spite of strong crystalline because abundant Na+ are involved in them and affected the efficiency of energy transfer between NaCMC and Tb3+. These nanocomposites could find potential biological applications base on their fluorescent and biodegradable properties. POLYM. COMPOS., 38:E498–E507, 2017. © 2016 Society of Plastics Engineers

v9x5AHBL.title: Preparation and Properties of Fluorescent Cellulosic Paper via Surface Coating of Anionic Cellulose Ethers / Rare Earth Metal Ions Composites
v9x5AHBL.abstract: Fluorescent paper made by coating cellulosic paper with fluorescent composites shows great potential in many fields, since this fluorescent paper could have both the intrinsic mechanical properties of the cellulosic paper and the florescent properties of the composites. In this research, we prepared fluorescent paper sheets by coating four new fluorescent composites, namely CMC/Eu(III), CMC/Tb(III), HPCMC/Eu(III)and HPCMC/Tb(III), onto a cellulosic paper. The analysis of the rheological behavior of the composites demonstrated that all fluorescent composites exhibited similar shear-shining and thixotropy properties as both the CMC and HPCMC solutions. This suggested that these fluorescent composites could be used as coating materials in the paper-making industry for making functional paper. The impacts of these coated composites on both the fluorescent and mechanical properties of the cellulosic paper were studied. Mechanical properties, including bursting strength, tensile strength, tensile rate, tearing ...

GwyrSz18.title: Solid fuel production by hydrothermal carbonization of water-like phase of bio-oil
GwyrSz18.abstract: Abstract   Hydrothermal carbonization was applied in water-like phase of bio-oil for the polymerization and carbonization of sugars and sugar derivatives. The hydrothermal carbonization was carried out in an autoclave from 130 to 230 °C, and solid fuels and stable oxygen containing liquid fuels were successfully obtained simultaneously. Results showed that with the temperature increased, polymerization and carbonization between sugars and sugar derivatives were accelerated and concurrent. The increase in final pressure and yields of extraction phase when the temperature was over 190 °C was mainly occurred by depolymerization of the polymer. The maximum yield, energy recovery efficiency, and carbon recovery efficiency of solid fuel (hydrochar) were 11.22 wt%, 50.38%, and 18.04%, respectively. The carbon content of hydrochars ranged from 63.87 to 73.95 wt%, and the high heating value (HHV) of hydrochars ranged from 25.51 to 30.48 MJ/kg. Compared with the water-like phase of bio-oil, the carbon content and high heating value of hydrochars were increased 1.58–1.84 times and 4.35–5.29 times, respectively. Combining the FT-IR spectra of hydrochars and ethyl acetate (EA) phase results, phenolic compounds were detected to be incorporated with hydrochars and the incorporation of both phenol, 1,2-Benzenediol was occurred when the temperature increased to 190 °C.

sd1E40bJ.title: On the Outsider's Going to the Countryside in Novels about Rural Life between 1949 and 1966——Based on the Story of Pioneers,Great Changes in the Mountain Village and Sunny Days
sd1E40bJ.abstract: Similar to "the returning home of the countrymen who reside in other places" in local-color literature,the "outsiders' going to the countryside" literature also has a similar prevailing plot.However,based on the different interpretations towards the mainstream discourse and the different orientations of emotions and value judgments towards the rural area,narrative pattern varies among different writers.As for texts,the "outsiders" and their going to the countryside can be categorized as implicit and explicit;in terms of identity,the outsiders are always cadres,soldiers and returning travelers,serving the functions of proving validity,infusing power discourse,and presenting the heroes' growth.

ElRuHoUx.title: To Be and Not to Be On SunLi's Attitude toward Life in His Declining Years
ElRuHoUx.abstract: As for Sun Li,declining is a turning point.This mental change,coming from physiological changes,is an obvious symptom to interpret Sun Li's life attitude in his declining years.The works of his late years,sometimes expressing "to be",occasionally "not to be",reveal his ambiguous mental process.The unbearable heaviness of being he suffered in Cultural Revolution,the understanding of life in extreme loneliness,and the yearning for death due to absolute disappointment,are the three main points of Sun Li's life attitude in his declining years.
keywords: Sun Li in his declining years

authors.name: YE Jun

ElRuHoUx.venue: Journal of Xinyang Normal University(Philosophy and Social Sciences Edition)

IG2Szb12.title: On the Formation SUN Li's Sense of Brokenness in His Twilight Years
IG2Szb12.abstract: After the ten years of the disastrous "cultural revolution",SUN Li got on a new stage in his life.Due to the dissatisfaction with his marriage lurking in the innermost of his heart,he could delicately appreciate the feminine beauty from a unique perspective,and such appreciation served him as the spiritual compensation.His aging and declining,together with the initial dissatisfaction and the following unsuccessful marriage,make SUN Li feel "a great sense of brokenness" about himself.This sense of brokenness endows the works he wrote in old age with the endless sentiment which impart distinctiveness to his works written in his later years.

zSExUTvY.title: On Sun Li's "Illness"
zSExUTvY.abstract: During the ten years before the Cultural Revolution,Sun Li didn't create much literary work.Sun Li himself blamed the state on the effect of illness,while in fact it was not the case.According to the study of "Sun Li in 1962",illness wasn't the main factor that affected his creative writing.As for Sun Li at that time,to write or not to write is a question of choosing standpoint and attitude towards life.With his brilliant choice,Sun Li became an unique individual among the intellectuals of his time.

8TPaKXql.title: Sentimentalism and the Others:Three Kind of Writing Mode in One Story——About "Qin and Xiao" Symptom Type Reading
8TPaKXql.abstract: Sun Li's liberated areas literature creation overall presents one kind brightly,upward poetic sentimental style in 1940s.It expresses a great time fervor participation,the poetic sentiment transmission and soldier writer image who highly supposes with the time pulsation.But as a system mainstream writer,his unique perhaps lies in his personality not completely defilade by the great time imagination in the certain degree.From the sad makings in short story "Qin and Xiao" and its twice rewriting,we can discover a cranny between the individual and the time as a writer.

zDmi08df.title: Living in Other Place——On the formation of a Countryside Homeland Imagination
zDmi08df.abstract: The formation of a countryside homeland imagination of contemporary Chinese writers results from their spiritual state of "living in other place". This embodies in a paradoxical mentality of sense and sensibility mixed with hatred and love for the homeland of these writers, or a special childhood experience, or an adherence to their value-orientation ans moral belief. And from the socio-historical origin, their imagination is connected with the loss of humanity spirit and value judgment in a transforming society and a social sentiment of fin-de-siecle. In this sense, countryside homeland imagination is the embodiement of the pursuit of spiritual homeland of contemporary Chinese in literary creation.

authors.name: YE Jun
authors.org: School of Literature, Heilongjiang University, Harbin, Heilongjiang , China

UM19kdZH.title: Gap and Syndrome──Treatise on Untimely SunLi in 1940s
UM19kdZH.abstract: SuLi's literary works in liberated areas in 1940s generally presented a bright,positive and poetic picture,which expressed his enthusiastic participation and poetic convey in that great period.It emphasized his image as a combatant writer who kept pace with the time.But we can feel personal feelings in his Anti-Japanese War narratives in 1940s.Qin and Xiao and the Clock are tow untimely works which suffered objection or even criticism in different periods.According to the interpretation of the texts and the narrative,we can see the gap between the author and the age he participated enthusiastically in many syndromes.

i6iHw2kO.title: On the Artistic Model of the Novel with the Theme of Anti-Japanese War by SUN Li
i6iHw2kO.abstract: While talking about the novels with Anti-Japanese theme by SUN li,people often conciously grasp the quality of "expressing emotion" and "poetic grace",and this is undouted fact.This quality enables his novels with Anti-Japanese theme fully to present the raw and dry literary creation background.In this paper,the author regards novels with Anti-Japanese theme by SUN Li as an artistic model,and investigates the cause of forming this model from the choice of narrating object,narrating scene and narrating perspective.

xiTBh5YA.title: The Properties of SPI/HPC Edible Films
xiTBh5YA.abstract: SPI/HPC edible films was prepared by adding hydroxy propyl cellulose (HPC) to soy protein isolate (SPI) films and the effect of HPC dosage on the properties of the edible film was studied. The results showed that the adding HPC greatly improved tensile strength and surface hydrophobicity of SPI films, while decreased their transparency. The strong interactions of the HEC and SPI moleculars might account for the changes of the SPI/HPC film properties.

mhzdDj3E.title: Effects of salts on hydrophilicity of edible soy protein isolate films
mhzdDj3E.abstract: The effects of NaCl,Na2CO3,Na2S2O3,Na3PO4,Na4P2O7,ZnCl2 and FeCl3 on hydrophilicity of soy protein isolate(SPI)films were studied,which involved the water content(WC),total soluble matter(TSM),water vapor permeability(WVP)and dynamic contact angle(DCA).The results showed that,comparing with the SPI film,the WC of SPI films with NaCl and FeCl3 increased 7.4% and 15.5%,however that with Na4P2O7,Na2S2O3,Na3PO4,Na2CO3 and ZnCl2 decreased WC by 18.8%,18.9%,3.8%,7.6% and 16.1% respectively.The TSM of SPI films with NaCl and Na2S2O3 increased slightly,but Na3PO4,Na2CO3,Na4P2O7,ZnCl2 and FeCl3 made TSM diminish 32.3%,13.7%,7.1%,12.7% and 23.9% respectively.The WVP of SPI films with Na3PO4,Na4P2O7,Na2CO3,Na2S2O3 and ZnCl2 raised 88.9%,51.4%,36.5%,28.7% and 21.0% respectively,however NaCl had no influence on the WVP,moreover,FeCl3 made the WVP of SPI film decrease slightly.The DCA of the SPI films with NaCl,Na2CO3,Na2S2O3 and FeCl3 in both polar and nonpolar solvent decreased,respectively,however the DCA of that with Na3PO4,Na4P2O7 and ZnCl2 was just reverse.

5jQugN3T.title: Influence of microwave irradiation on structures of tapioca starch
5jQugN3T.abstract: The time-temperature profiles of open or sealed tapioca starch systems with different moisture contents subjected to microwave processing were established and the multi-level structures of tapioca starch after irradiation were investigated.For both open and sealed systems, the lower the moisture content in tapioca starch,the faster the temperature rose, and isothermal transformation occurred in the starch samples.The time of isothermal transformation became longer with the rise of moisture content.Moreover, the interval lengths of isothermal transformation were also more obvious with the samples irradiated in open beakers as compared to those irradiated in sealed beakers.FTIR data suggested no new functional groups on the molecular chain of starch irradiated by microwave, only the infrared crystalline indices of the starch samples slightly decreasing.After irradiation, microscope (or polarizing microscope) data indicated that the crystal structure of the tapioca starch changed, but its morphologic structure remained unchanged.It was believed that tapioca starch food irradiated by microwave is safe for human being and other creatures.

pIJ6Yt5P.title: The Study of Effects of Modified Starch Sizings on Performances of Grey Bottom Board
pIJ6Yt5P.abstract: In this paper,a variety of modified starch sizing agents made by Dongguan Jianhui Paper Co.LTD were applied in the production of grey bottom board,Moreover,the bursting strength,Scott bond strength and water adsorbency of right side of papers were investigated.The results showed that the paper sized with the sizing of food grade corn starch modified by enzyme was better than that sized with the sizing of the commercial modified cassava starch in bursting strength and Scott bond strength,and they had similar performance in water adsorbency.Therefore,from performance of the paper,the sizing of food grade corn starch modified by enzyme could be a substitute for the commercial modified cassava starch.

AqQOrsLT.title: Solubility of Cellulose in ZnCl_2 Aqueous Solution and Structure of Regenerated Cellulose
AqQOrsLT.abstract: The paper deals with the dissolving ability of ZnCl2 aqueous solutions with various mass fractions for cellulose with different degrees of polymerization(DP).It is found out that(1) ZnCl2 aqueous solutions cannot dissolve cellulose unless the salt mass fraction is higher than 65.0%;(2) when ZnCl2 content is not less than 65.0%,the Zn2+ ions unsaturated by water molecules connect with the hydroxyl groups of cellulose,which makes the cellulose to dissolve;and(3) ZnCl2 aqueous solution with a content of 65.0% is of the best dissolving ability for cellulose,and the ability decreases with the increase in DP.It is also indicated by WAXD results that the regenerated cellulose is the crystalline transformation of cellulose Ⅱ.Moreover,FT-IR results show that ZnCl2 aqueous solution is a direct solvent for cellulose,and that the intramolecular hydrogen bond of regenerated cellulose weakens after the dissolution.

Z3Jl61Kc.abstract: In recent years,ionic liquids have been studied as green solvents for cellulose,reaction media for homogeneous cellulose derivatizations,and preservatives,anti-electrostatic agents and finishing agents for cellulose materials such as paper,wood and fiber.In this paper,recent developments are reviewed with 25 refs.

LL62W5WK.title: Preparation of High-concentration Fermented Milk for Use in Foods and Effect of Simultanesou Enzymatic Hydrolysis and Fermentation on Fermentation Characteristics
LL62W5WK.abstract: A high-concentration reconstituted milk with containing 7.8% protein was fermented by Lactobacillus casei to produce fermented milk for use in foods.We examined the changes in fermentation characteristics including acidicty,the viable cell number of the starter and amino nitrogen content.A complex enzymatic preparation of lipase and protease and the inoculum were added together to simultaneously hdyrolyze and ferment the reconstituted milk.As a result,a fermented milk higher in acidity and amino nitrogen was yield.Both indicators were greatly influenced by the addition of the complex enzymatic preparation.The fermented milk obtaiend after 72 h of single fermentation exhibited a titrtable acidity of 268.5 °T and an amino nitrogen content of 0.117 g/100 g,compared to 414.4 °T and 0.132 g/100 g for that obtained after 72 h of simultaneous hydrlysis and fermentation.Furthermore,titratable acidity and amino nitrogen content of fermented milk increased with increasing amount of the enzymatic preparation added to the reconstituted milk.However,neither pH nor the viable cell number of Lactobacillus casei was affected by the dosage of the enzymatic preparation.

akth1eWf.title: The Synthesis of Carboxymethyl-hydroxyethyl-starch and Its Application for Coating Paper
akth1eWf.abstract: In this paper,a kind of polyanion starch,carboxymethyl-hydroxyethyl-starch(HECMS) was synthesized.The effects of temperature of carboxymehtylation and ratios of reactants of hydroxyethylation were investigated.The results showed that 49℃ and 1:3.5 of reactants ratio(starch: 2-chloroethanol) were favorable for the carboxymethylation in the experiment.However,the viscosity of HECMS decreased with DS of carboxymethylation rising.HECMS and HECMS/Eu(Ⅲ) were applied to coating paper.The results showed that they could improve the tearing strength and elongation of the coating paper,yet reduced the tensile stregth of coating paper;the brightness of the coating paper with HECMS/Eu(Ⅲ) rose because of its fluorescence property.

gTLdGojR.title: Synthesis and Flocculating Effect of Flocculating Agent of Cellulose
gTLdGojR.abstract: In this paper,the derivative of hydroxylethylcellulose(HEC) with flocculating effect was synthesized and characterized by FTIR.The influences of reaction conditions,such as the charges of HEC,H_2O_2 and HClO and reaction time,on flocculating effects were investigated.The results show that higher charges of HEC、H_2O_2 and HClO,and longer reaction time resulted in higher-COOH content and better flocculating effect.However,when the charge of H_2O_2 was too high,the chain of cellulose was broken and the flocculating effect decreased.

IwTYFUEi.title: Analysis of Chemical Components and Morphology of the Stem Fiber of Lavandula Pinnata L
IwTYFUEi.abstract: In this paper,the chemical components and the morphology of the stem fibers of Lavandula pinnata were studied.The results showed that moisture content was 17.09%,benzene-alcohol extract content was 8.25%,total lignin content was 32.04%,and nitric-ethanol cellulose content was 27.62% and its viscosity-average molecular weight was 2.3×105.Meanwhile,the fibers of lavender stem had the general morphological characteristics of herb fibers,such as their average fiber length,the length-width ratio and wall-lumen ratio were 0.54mm,43,and 0.41,respectively.The fibers contained a large number of vessel cells and some miscellaneous cells by microscope observation.

6Wg4tGuE.title: Effect of Alkali Metal Ions and Alkaline-Earth Metal Ions on Viscosity of Hydroxylethylcellulose in Aqueous Solution
6Wg4tGuE.abstract: In this paper,we uested the effect of Na+、K+、Mg2+、Ca2+ on the viscosity of hydroxyethylcellulose(HEC) in aqueous solution by rotating viscosity meter.The results showed that HEC in the test had good stability and salt-tolerant property.The viscosities of HEC in aqueous solution in existence of all concentration range of Na+ in the test were higher than HEC itself's.What is more,the concentration of Mg2+ reached 80%,the viscosity of HEC in aqueous solution still maintained high level.This provided reference data for exploring new application of HEC.

NET71P1B.title: UV-Based Rapid Determination of Degree of Substitution of CMC with High Substitution
NET71P1B.abstract: Proposed in this paper is a UV-based method to rapidly determine the degree of substitution(DS) of carboxymethyl cellulose(CMC) with high substitution.In this method,a curve of the UV absorbance of CMC-Cu(Ⅱ) solution versus the volume of dilute copper sulfate solution is obtained via the reaction CMC and Cu(Ⅱ),which is divided into three regions,of which regionⅠ defined by Lambert-Beer's law corresponds to the stoichiometrical reaction of the carboxyl groups on CMC chain with Cu(Ⅱ) ions.Then,by fitting the curve in region Ⅰ,a straight line is obtained.When the square of correlation coefficient is more than 0.990,the DS of CMC can be calculated according to the volume of dilute copper sulfate solution at the intersection with maximum absorbance.The proposed method,which is of the advantages of rapidity,simplicity and is of small quantity of sample involved,is accurate in determining the DS of CMC with a DS higher than 0.80.As compared with the national standard method,the error of the proposed method ranges from 1.7% to 3.5% only.

CSavB74P.title: Estimation of Stability of Modified Starch Surface Sizings and Their Economy of Industry Application
CSavB74P.abstract: In this paper,food grade corn starch and raw cassava starch were modified by the ammonium persulfate and α-amylase,and then were cooked into surface sizings for the production of grey bottom board.By investigating the variation of viscosity and solid content of these modified starch sizings with the time,the stability of these sizings was estimated.Furthermore,from the cost of raw materials,equipment investment and technical processing,the economy and practical application of these starch sizings were estimated.The results showed that,compared with commercial modified cassava starch,the modified corn starch sizing by α-amylase was more considerable stability and cheaper,but it consisted of more impurities and needed higher initial investment of equipment.It could substitute commercial modified cassava starch for production of grey bottom board below 350g/m2.

PcQDGISD.title: Degradation and Homogeneous Derivatization of Cellulose in Room Temperature Ionic Liquid AmimCl
PcQDGISD.abstract: Dissolution and homogeneous modification of sugarcane bagasse cellulose was performed in room-temperature ionic liquid 1-ally1-3-methylimidazolium chloride(AmimCl) with phthalic anhydride in the absence of any catalyst.The results showed the dissolution of cellulose in AmimCl resulted in a noticeable degradation by reducing its degree of polymerization from 1276.6 to 933.8.The degree of substitution of phthalated cellulosic derivatives increased with the increment of reaction temperature,reaction time,and the molar ratio of phthalic anhydride/anhydroglucose units in cellulose under the conditions given.The products were characterized by FT-IR and solid-state CP/MAS13 NMR spectroscopy,and the results revealed that the phthalation reaction of hydroxyl groups at C-6,C-2,and C-3 positions of the cellulose all occurred.

dtjihmZA.abstract: A quantitative analytical method was established for spinosad content determination with HPLC.Results showed that the standard deviation,coefficient of variation,linear correlation,and average recovery were 1.3441,0.99959,0.99959,and 99.2429%,respectively.The target compound was also validated with LC-MS.

S1X6QHty.title: Research Progress in Cellulose-based Adsorbents
S1X6QHty.abstract: A very attractive feature of cellulose,hemicellulose and starch is their chemical composition with a large amount of relatively easily accessible hydroxyl groups.Derivatization of hydroxyl groups in these polysaccharides,fibers and lignocellulosic materials can be used for the attachment of a variety of functional groups and to produce useful adsorbents.The present paper reviewed the research progress in cellulose-based adsorbents.

t31SfCrF.title: The Influence of Glycerin on Static Rheological Properties of SPI Solution
t31SfCrF.abstract: The influence of glycerin on static rheological properties and the rehological behaviors of SPI solutions were investigated.The change of shear viscosity of SPI with concentration and temperature after adding glycerin was discussed,specially comparing with SPI control solution.The results have indicated that SPI/glycerin solutions presented a typical behavior of pseudoplastic fluid,and glycerin not only reduced the viscosity and weakened pseudoplastic behavior of SPI but also improve its thermal stability.

hCknFPTc.title: Effect of Microwave Radiation on Structure and Properties of Starch
hCknFPTc.abstract: This paper introduced the principle of microwave irradiation on starch briefly.It is generalized that the investigation progress at home and abroad about the effect of microwave radiation on morphological structure and crystalline structure and gel property and thermal property of the starch.For example,the microwave radiation could change the morphologic structure,the crystal structure and the crystallinity of starch.The parameters of the microwave irradiation,such as irradiation time and wave power etc,could change the gel properties of starch.Solubility,swelling ability and water absorption of starch were lower than that of the native starch.

0wtGC9Iy.title: The Study of Preparation Technology of Lithium Carboxymethylcellulose by CMC-Na
0wtGC9Iy.abstract: Sodium carboxymethylcellulose(CMC-Na),as raw material,was transformed into lithium carboxymethylcellulose(CMC-Li)after acidification and neutralization.According to the atomic absorption intensity of lithium ion,the influences on the preparation of CMC-Li were discussed.The results indicated that the optimum conditions were reaction temperature at 35℃ and 10min acidification time;when added 3mL 12%(wt∶wt) LiOH aqueous solution,the Li ion content of CMC-Li was 0.7215 mg/L,that was equivalent to 0.23 DS of —COOLi.By compairing with FT-IR of CMC-Na,CMC-H and CMC-Li,syntheses of CMC-Li was testified in this experiment.

PPALczBm.title: Research development in reducing production cost of biodiesel
PPALczBm.abstract: Besides policy factors,five methods of cost-cutting of biodiesel are reviewed,including new raw material with higher oil content,shorter regeneration cycle,which is suitable for infertile soil and different climatic conditions;heterogeneous catalysts;new technologies(e.g.supercritical methanol and ultrasonics);higher added value utilization of by-product glycerin with simple method(propylene oxide chloride,1,3-propanediol,pyruvic alcohol etc.) and moderate scale of production.

sGLkhyky.title: Influence of Cation on the Performance of SPI Films
sGLkhyky.abstract: In this paper,the wet process was adopted to prepare edible soy protein isolate(SPI) films.The influences of valence states of the cations(Na+,Zn2+ and Fe3+) on the performance of SPI films were studied.The results showed that valence states of the cations had no effect on the transparency of the SPI film,but increased its water vapor permeability(WVP).The SPI films showed best performance by adding 2.0%(w/w SPI) of Fe3+.

SdFuXToF.title: Effect of pH on size and dispersion of CMC/Eu nanocomposites with high fluorescence intensity
SdFuXToF.abstract: CMC/Eu nanocomposites were synthesized under microwave-assisted by reacting with Eu 3+ and CMC, a kind of biodegradable polymer. The structure, surface topography and luminance were characterized by FT-IR, SEM, AFM and fluorescence spectrum. Effect of pH on sizes and distribution of CMC/Eu nanocomposites was also discussed in detail. The results showed that fluorescence intensities of CMC/Eu nanocomposites was much stronger than that of bulk CMC/Eu; particle sizes of CMC/Eu nanocomposites were from 150 to 500nm; moreover, the particle sizes decreasing and particle distribution were more uniformly with pH increasing. The particle size was smallest and well-distributed when pH is 13.4.

uzMcn8tZ.title: Determination of Carboxyl Content in Sodium Carboxymethyl Cellulose by FT-IR Spectroscopy
uzMcn8tZ.abstract: Sodium carboxymethyl cellulose(CMC) is converted to CMC-H,treated with concentrated nitric acid.Then CMC-H's characteristic infrared absorption at 1735cm-1 was selected as the characteristic peak.The baseline of 1918.9cm-1-1529.3cm-1 is used,to avoid the influence of moisture content on the measurement of 1735cm-1 peak height.KSCN was used as a internal standard and a good linear standard curve has been got(R2 = 0.980).The results indicate that carboxyl content in sodium carboxymethyl cellulose can be analyzed by the method of Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy(FT-IR).

dja3VB5t.title: The Effect of Cationic Guar Gum on the Properties of Handsheets
dja3VB5t.abstract: In this study,we investigated the effects of two cationic guar gums with different degree of substitution on the properties of handsheets of hardwood pulp.The results showed that the changes of brightness,tearing strength and porosity of handsheets with two cationic guar gums were the same,that is,the brightness of the hand-sheets decreased with the growing concentration of cationic guar gum;the tearing strength of the handsheets increased with the growing concentration of cationic guar gum;and the porosity of the handsheets reached the peaks at a certain concentration of cationic guar gum.However,the influences of two cationic guar gum with different degree of substitution on the tensile strength of handsheets were big different.The cationic guar gum with lower cationic strength made the tensile strength of handsheet decrease,yet the tensile strength of handsheet rose at 2.5‰ concentration of cationic guar gum with hihger cationic strength.

bBvpkCuB.title: Study on the Reaction between Sugarcane Bagasse and Succinic Anhydride
bBvpkCuB.abstract: Carboxylation of unprocessed sugarcane bagasse with succinic anhydride under ultrasound irradiation was studied.The effects of ultrasound-irradiating time,reaction time,reaction temperature,and anhydride dosage on the reaction were discussed.The extent of carboxylation was measured by the weight percent gain(WPG).FT-IR spectra of unmodified and carboxylated(bagasse) were also used to characterize the effects of experimental conditions on carboxylation.The results showed that modification of bagasse with succinic anhydride is an efficient method for preparation of products containing carboxylic groups.Increases of reaction time,anhydride dosage,and reaction temperature led to increment of WPG under given experimental conditions.A WPG of(39.4%) was achieved under the condition of ultrasound-irradiation time 30 min,reaction time 60 min,succinic(anhydride) dosage by the ratio of anhydride to dried bagasse 1.25∶1,and reaction temperature(115 ℃).The samples were also characterized by(CP/MAS) ~(13)C NMR spectroscopy.It was found that during treatment of sugarcane bagasse with succinic anhydride under the conditions used,both polysaccharide and lignin participated the reaction.The crystallinity indexes of cellulose in(sugarcane) bagasse(decreased) after chemical modification.

rg6LD1Fi.title: Effects of HPMC and CMC on the Properties of Gluten-free Bread
rg6LD1Fi.abstract: In this paper,pure rice flour and sweet potato starch were used as raw materials for production of gluten-free bread.The effects of hydroxypropyl methyl cellulose(HPMC) and carboxymethyl cellulose(CMC) on specific volume,water loss rate,skin color,hardness and springiness of gluten-free bread were studied,and sensory quality of the bread was evaluated.The results showed that compared to the control,the bread added with 2% CMC had higher specific volume up to 22% and the bread added with 2% CMC had higher color index up to 37% and the bread added with 1% CMC showed lower water loss rate by 7%.After 24 h and 48 h,the hardness of the bread containing 1% CMC reduced by 18% and 21%,respectively,and the springiness rate of the bread containing 1% HPMC reduced by 18% and 19%,respectively.

z9zOdZxk.title: Progress in the application of cellulose ethers for dry-mixed mortar
z9zOdZxk.abstract: Using dry-mixed mortar to substitute traditional mortar is a current trend for its many advantages,and cellulose ether(CE) is a kind of important additives for dry-mixed mortar.This article summarizes the effect of several mono-cellulose-ethers and mixed-cellulose-ethers conventionally used on the quality of dry-mixed mortar,such as water absorption,thickening,liquidity,workability and mortar strength etc.It is considered that mixed-cellulose-ethers are better than mono-cellulose-ethers.The fast development of dry-mixed mortar brings forward a higher demand for the production of CE.Therefore,the cellulose ether industry should catch up this opportunity to increase the level of technology,to develop CE varieties and to improve production stability.

jvzUk6on.title: Synthesis, structure and thermal property of dialdehyde carboxymethyl cellulose prepared at low pH value
jvzUk6on.abstract: Dialdehyde carboxymethyl cellulose (DACMC) was synthesized by oxidizing carboxymethyl cellulose (CMC) with periodate NaIO4 at low pH value, and the effects of pH value on the oxidation degree of CMC, as well as on the crystal structure, morphology and thermal stability of DACMC, were investigated by means of FT-IR, 13C NMR, XRD and AFM. The results show that (1) pH value significantly and irregularly affects the oxidation degree of DACMC, and the oxidation degree reaches its maximum at pH 1.5, with an aldehyde content of 54.35%; (2) carbonyl groups are introduced into the molecular chain of CMC, which is verified by FT-IR and 13C NMR results; (3) the crystallinity of DACMC is higher than that of CMC and increases with pH value; (4) due to the break of glucopyranose rings, the molecular chain of DACMC becomes softer, entangles with each other more compactly and arranges more regularly, while the Z dimension of DACMC surface decreases with the increase of aldehyde content; and (5) the thermal stability of DACMC is poorer than that of CMC, especially in the condition of pH 1.5.

BndQL38h.title: The Rehological Behavior of HEC Aqueous Solution
BndQL38h.abstract: The rehological behaviors of HEC solutions have been investigated by using viscosimeter and rheometer. The influencing factors on the apparent viscosity and shear viscosity of HEC have also been discussed. In addition, the relationship between those factors and the intermolecular structure of HEC in solutions has been discussed. It was indicated that,the change of apparent viscosity of HEC along with concentration tallied with the experience expressions of Huggins; with the time prolongation,the chains of HEC in aqueous solution slacked which resulted in the decrease of the apparent viscosity of the solutions; and the HEC solutions presented a typical behavior of pseudoplastic fluid. Under the conditions of this experiment, the shear viscosity increased as the concentration increased.

QtFWzSUl.title: Rheological Properties of Lithium Carboxymethylcellulose Aqueous Solution
QtFWzSUl.abstract: In this paper,rheological property of lithium carboxymethylcellulose(CMC-Li) was studied,and the influences of different preparation condition on the rheological properties are also investigated.The results showed that CMC-Li has the similar rheological behavior to sodium carboxymethylcellulose(CMC-Na),that is,CMC-Li also has non-Newtonian fluid property;CMC-Li molecule chains was easier to direct,stretch and dewind under sharing force function;the zero-rate viscosity of CMC-Li at 7min acidification time is the highest;the variation trends of CMC-Li aqueous solutions under different prepared reaction temperature are the same,i.e.temperatures has small effect on degradation of products,the zero-rate viscosity of aqueous solution at reaction temperature 23℃ is the highest.

pXzdjjQx.title: The Properties of Edible Films Based on Soy Protein Isolate and Modified Cellulose
pXzdjjQx.abstract: The influence of methyl cellulose(MC),hydroxy propyl cellulose(HPC)and hydroxy properlene methyl cellulose(HPMC) added with different mass percentages,on the properties of soy protein isolate (SPI) films was studied.The results show that both substituents and the mass percentages of the modified celluloses can shift the properties of SPI blending films due to change the intermolecular and intramolecular interactions of SPI chains.The transparency of the films all decreases; but the tensile strength and the surface hydrophobicity of the blending films are improved significantly,in the same mass percentages of the modified celluloses,the effect on the tensile strength increases with HPC,MC,and HPMC; however,the surface hydrophobicity rises with MC,HPMC and HPC.Espcially,the blending films of SPI/MC have not only tensile strength,but longer the percentage elongation at break than others.

m1o9itSk.title: Influence of Ultrasonic Radiation on Extraction of Corn Carotenoids
m1o9itSk.abstract: The effect of ultrasonic radiation on the extraction of carotenoids from corn was investigated and the structure of extracted carotenoids was characterized by FTIR.The results show that,when the mass ratio of corn to ethanol is 1∶6,the ultrasonic radiation with a frequency of 20kHz and a power of 900W at 33~40℃ for 30min may result in an increased mass fraction of carotenoids,which is 16.25 times that without ultrasonic treatment,and that the mass fraction of carotenoids increases with ultrasonic power at 33~35℃,little influence on the extraction of corn carotenoids being caused by ultrasonic frequency.The results also indicate that,at the first extraction stage,the Sonic Horn should be immerged half depth into the extraction liquid,and after an extraction for 12min,it should be immerged 1/2~1/3 depth into the extraction liquid.Moreover,the mechanism of ultrasonic enhancement on the extraction of corn carotenoids was discussed in this paper.The final results obtained by FTIR reveal that ultrasonic has no effect on the chemical structure of corn carotenoids.

UEA93qxP.title: Carboxylation of Sugarcane Bagasse and Characterization of Carboxylated Sugarcane Bagasse
UEA93qxP.abstract: Maleic anhydride and phthalic anhydride were used to carboxylate unprocessed sugarcane bagasse after ultrasonic radiation,and the effects of ultrasonic radiation time,the reaction temperature and the anhydride dosage on the carboxylation yield were investigated.The yield was then compared with that of the sugarcane bagasse treated with succinic anhydride.Experimental results show that the carboxylation yield reaches the maximum with an ultrasonic radiation for 30min at the reaction temperature of 90℃.Characterization results of the carboxylated sugarcane bagasse by FTIR,CP/MAS 13CNMR spectroscopy and thermal analysis indicate that there occurs the esterification of the hydroxyl groups at C2 and C3 positions in the cellulose,and that the thermal stability of the modified sugarcane bagasse decreases due to the esterification.

m6Y9FSYy.title: Influence of Solvent Properties on Fluorescent Properties of Water-Soluble Cellulose Ethers/Eu(Ⅲ)
m6Y9FSYy.abstract: The effects of solvent polarity and protonic solvent on the fluorescent properties of hydroxyethyl cellulose(HEC)/Eu(Ⅲ),methyl cellulose(MC)/Eu(Ⅲ) and carboxymethyl cellulose(CMC)/Eu(Ⅲ) complexes were investigated by fluorescent spectroscopy to reveal the interaction between the fluorescent substance and the solvent on the microcosmic level.The results show that(1) the dipole moment of HEC/Eu(Ⅲ) complex in the excited state greatly changes with the increase in the polarity of H_2O/CH_3OH solvent,which makes the fluorescent spectrum of HEC/Eu(Ⅲ) complex,whose intensity depends on various factors,shifts to the long-wavelength side;(2) the increase in the H~+ concentration of H_2O/HAc solvent results in a reorientation of the solvent cages around MC/Eu(Ⅲ) complex as well as a great Stokes shift of the fluorescent spectrum due to the solvent relaxation;and(3) the increase in the polarity of H_2O/CH_3COCH_3 solvent has no obvious effect on the Stokes shift of CMC/Eu(Ⅲ) complex,but it may break the equilibrium between intra-and inter-molecular hydrogen bonds in the complexes,thus changing the structure of the fluorescent substance and the intensities of the fluorescent spectra.

IiBoOAiG.title: Influences of Ions on Viscosities of CMC Aqueous Solution
IiBoOAiG.abstract: In this paper,influences of different ions with different quantities on viscosities of 1.0% CMC aqueous solutions were investigated by coating-Ⅳ-viscometer.The results showed that the viscosities of CMC aqueous solutions could be raised by adding salts of both Ca2 +and Mg2 +,no matter anions were Cl-or SO2 + 4,especially,the influence of Ca2 +was more significant,e.g.,the viscosities of CMC aqueous solutions were increased maximally 47.0% and 48.1% by adding CaCl 2 and CaSO 4,respectively.Anions in sodium salts played more important roles in affecting the viscosities of CMC aqueous solutions,e.g.,adding NaCl into the solution made the viscosity of the solution decrease,but adding Na 2 SO 4 made the viscosity of the solution increase at some additive concentration.

XA2huuJi.title: Research progress of rheological behavior of modified hydroxyethyl cellulose solutions
XA2huuJi.abstract: The studies of the rheological behavior of modified hydroxyethyl cellulose(HEC) solutions in the presence of different kinds of surfactants are reviewed,and the mechanisms of the increase in viscosity that is partially due to the change in the molecular structure of HEC are also discussed.

EHRGA9kY.title: Scattering Phase Functions in Transport Equation
EHRGA9kY.abstract: Scattering phase function plays an important role in the transport computation.Few of literatures concern about the description of scattering phase function.In order to make a comprehensive research,this paper presents on a survey on the distributed functions(scattering phase functions).The theoretical calculation of the scattering question relating to reactor physics,astrophysics,as well as the atmospheric radiation transport,uses similar solving methods.The paper describes a qualitative concept of processing methods of these distributed functions,which could be useful for research in transport computing.
